data.text: Yake babarima Agur nsɛm a ɔkae a ɛyɛ nkuranhyɛ:
“Me na minnim hwee koraa wɔ nnipa mu,
Minsuaa nyansa,
Hena na waforo akɔ ɔsoro na wasian aba fam?
“Onyankopɔn asɛm biara yɛ nokware;
Mfa biribi nka nʼasɛm ho,
“Awurade, nneɛma abien na mehwehwɛ afi wo nkyɛn;
ma me ne atoro ne nnaadaasɛm ntam nware koraa;
Anyɛ saa a, ebia minya me ho pii a ɛbɛma mapa wo
“Nsɛe ɔsomfo din nkyerɛ ne wura;
“Nnipa bi dome wɔn agyanom,
Wɔn a wɔteɛ wɔ wɔn ankasa ani so
wɔn a wɔn ani tra ntɔn,
wɔn a wɔn se yɛ afoa
“Amemem wɔ mmabea baanu
Ɔda,
“Ani a eyi agya ahi,
“Nneɛma abiɛsa na ɛyɛ me nwonwa,
Ɔkwan a ɔkɔre nam so wɔ wim,
“Ɔbea ɔwaresɛefo kwan ni:
“Nneɛma abiɛsa na ɛma asase wosow,
akoa a wabɛyɛ ɔhene,
ɔbea a wɔmpɛ no na waware,
“Nneɛma nketenkete anan na ɛwɔ asase so,
Ntɛtea yɛ abɔde nketewa a wonni ahoɔden,
Nkukuban30.26 Nkukuban yɛ nnanko mu ahorow bi a, wɔtena akuwakuw wɔ mmepɔw mu. yɛ abɔde a wonni ahoɔden,
mmoadabi nni ɔhene,
wotumi de nsa kyere ɔketew,
“Nneɛma abiɛsa na wɔwɔ abirɛmpɔnnantew,
gyata, mmoadoma hene a, biribiara mmɔ no hu;
akokɔnini a ɔretutu taataa,
“Sɛ woayɛ ɔkwasea ama wo ho so,
Sɛnea wɔka nufusu nu mu a srade fi mu ba,
